All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddClient
The AddClient class represents the UI for adding a new client.
AddProduct
The AddProduct class represents the UI for adding a new product.
Client
The Client class represents a client entity in the system.
ClientController
The ClientController class manages operations related to clients.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class provides methods to interact with the database for client-related operations.
ClientDAORepo
The ClientDAORepo interface defines methods for interacting with client data in the database.
ClientManagementFrame
The ClientManagementFrame class represents the user interface for managing clients.
DatabaseConnectionManager
The DatabaseConnectionManager class manages the connection to the database.
DatabaseConstants
The DatabaseConstants class contains constants related to database configuration.
DeleteClient
The DeleteClient class represents the UI for deleting a client.
DeleteProduct
The DeleteProduct class represents the UI for deleting a product.
GenericDAO<T>
GenericDAO class provides generic methods for CRUD operations on any table entity.
GenericDAORepo<T>
This interface represents a generic DAO repository for CRUD operations on entities.
Main
The Main class represents the entry point of the application.
MainFrame
The MainFrame class represents the main frame of the application, which allows access to different management functionalities.
ModifyClient
The ModifyClient class represents the UI for modifying a client.
ModifyProduct
The ModifyProduct class represents the UI for modifying a product.
Order
The Order class represents an order entity in the system.
OrderController
The OrderController class manages operations related to orders.
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class provides methods for interacting with order data in the database.
OrderDAORepo
The OrderDAORepo interface defines the contract for interacting with order data in the database.
OrderManagementFrame
The OrderManagementFrame class represents the user interface for creating product orders.
Product
The Product class represents a product entity in the system.
ProductController
The ProductController class manages operations related to products.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class provides methods to interact with product data in the database.
ProductDAORepo
The ProductDAORepo interface defines methods for interacting with product data in the database.
ProductManagementFrame
The ProductManagementFrame class represents the user interface for managing products.
TestGenericDAO
A test class to demonstrate the usage of GenericDAO with a Client entity.
